description: A layout in the Cases domain. Layouts define the following configuration in the top section and More Info tab of the Cases user interface: Fields to display to the users and Field ordering.

BasicLayout.description: Defines the field layout for the agent's case interface. Configures which fields appear in the top panel (immediately visible) and More Info tab (expandable section) of the case view, allowing customization of the agent experience.
BasicLayout.markdownDescription:
Defines the field layout for the agent's case interface. Configures which fields appear in the top panel (immediately visible) and More Info tab (expandable section) of the case view, allowing customization of the agent experience.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FieldGroup.description: Consists of a group of fields and associated properties.

Name.description: A descriptive name for the field group. Helps organize related fields together in the layout interface.
Name.markdownDescription:
A descriptive name for the field group. Helps organize related fields together in the layout interface.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 100  
Update requires: No interruption

Fields.description: An ordered list of fields to display in this group. The order determines the sequence in which fields appear in the agent interface. Each field is referenced by its unique field ID.
Fields.markdownDescription:
An ordered list of fields to display in this group. The order determines the sequence in which fields appear in the agent interface. Each field is referenced by its unique field ID.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

FieldGroup.markdownDescription:
Consists of a group of fields and associated properties.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: The unique identifier of a field.
Id.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of a field.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption

FieldItem.markdownDescription:
Field specific properties.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LayoutContent.description: Defines the layout structure and field organization for the case interface. Specifies which fields appear in the top panel and More Info tab, and their display order.
LayoutContent.markdownDescription:
Defines the layout structure and field organization for the case interface. Specifies which fields appear in the top panel and More Info tab, and their display order.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

LayoutSections.description: Sections within a panel or tab of the page layout.

Sections.description: Defines the sections within a panel or tab. Contains field groups that organize related fields together.
Sections.markdownDescription:
Defines the sections within a panel or tab. Contains field groups that organize related fields together.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LayoutSections.markdownDescription:
Sections within a panel or tab of the page layout.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Section.description: A section can be a grouped list of fields.
Section.markdownDescription:
A section can be a grouped list of fields.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: The tags that you attach to this layout.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags that you attach to this layout.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
